name: WEST VIRGINIA UNIVERSITY
sampleDescriptions: Funding for Higher Education Programs and Research in the 2018 and 2019 appropriations bills.
Concerns with provisions in HR 4508, the PROSPER Act.
No pending legislation, issues regarding the recommended divestment of NSF facility at Green Bank, WV.
Support for HR 5261, the TEACH Act.
Funding for Higher Education Programs and Research in the 2019 appropriations bills.
